alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:22AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, northeastern Anderson and east central Pickens Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 122 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Easley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easley, Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Welcome, Powdersville, Piedmont and Donaldson Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville
